author: cnbc.com
title: E. Cohen & Company, CPAs Promotes Robin Meisner Cameron, CPA to Principal
text:
ROCKVILLE, Md., Feb. 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- E. Cohen & Company, a full-service CPA firm based in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area with over 50 employees, is pleased to announce that Robin Meisner Cameron, CPA will serve as Principal of the firm to enhance its capability in tax compliance and consulting for high net worth individuals and professional services firms. Robin has three decades of experience in the preparation and review of individual, corporate, and partnership tax returns with a specialty in high-net-worth individuals and attorneys. Robin also assists entities with the tax requirements of their initial registrations, ongoing tax compliance, and consults on mergers and acquisitions as well as other transitional issues.
Of the promotion of Robin Cameron, the firm's Managing Principal, Eric Cohen said, "Robin has won the recognition of the Washington, D.C. region's top business executives in regional surveys. She is recognized for her efficient, accurate, responsive service, her ability to ensure her clients' compliance with all regulations and accounting practices, and her creative and personal approach in addressing her clients' consulting needs." Cohen adds, "Robin has been a wonderful employee for over 15 years, and her excellent technical knowledge and ability to manage a large number of clients has helped me create the great firm that we have today."
Robin says she is proud of her continuing association with a firm she feels "is passionate about providing an excellent client experience and is dedicated to being a great firm to work for. Ultimately, this business is about the people we serve; their needs, goals and aspirations. At ECC we pride ourselves on helping our clients meet those goals while keeping them in compliance with applicable laws and regulations."
About E. Cohen & Company, CPAs: E. Cohen and Company, CPAs is a full-service CPA firm of over 50 professionals based in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area providing audit & assurance, outsourced CFO, controller & accounting services, tax compliance & consulting, and business advisory services since 1991. It serves the tax, audit and business advisory needs of Government Contractors, Nonprofit Organizations, High Net Worth Individuals, Real Estate Companies, Professional Services Firms, Wholesalers, Restaurant Groups, Professional Athletes and Sports Executives. For more information, visit https://ecohencpas.com .
Eric Cohen, CPA
E. Cohen & Company, CPAs
